N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1020.3 - Background

State Regulations

The use by inmates of illicit drugs and alcohol presents a
serious threat to the safety and security of a correctional facility. Urinalysis testing of inmates can be an effective means by which to detect and
discipline inmate use of illicit drugs or alcohol. Aggressive and consistent
urinalysis testing will be one of many components of a program to ensure a drug
free environment within the department's facilities. Notes
